mapped_achievements.name: All Aboard
mapped_achievements.description: In a public match, activate the Foghorn by repairing the generator in the Steamboat and escape.

mapped_achievements.name: Ancestor's Rite
mapped_achievements.description: In a public match, repair the generator in the Family Residence and live to tell the tale.

mapped_achievements.name: Apt Killer
mapped_achievements.description: Start a public match with a full killer loadout.

mapped_achievements.name: Apt Survivor
mapped_achievements.description: Start a public match with a full survivor loadout.

mapped_achievements.name: Awakened Anger
mapped_achievements.description: In public matches, damage a Survivor who just blinded you within 30 seconds.

mapped_achievements.name: Battle Caster
mapped_achievements.description: As The Lich, injure a Survivor with a basic attack within 15 seconds of casting a spell 25 times.

mapped_achievements.name: Beyond Broken
mapped_achievements.description: Injure a Survivor afflicted by the Broken Status Effect with a Basic Attack a total of 50 times.

mapped_achievements.name: Binding Teeth
mapped_achievements.description: Playing as The Houndmaster, injure 25 Survivors detained by the Dog in public matches.

mapped_achievements.name: Biological Weaponry
mapped_achievements.description: Down Contaminated Survivors with The Nemesis 65 times in public matches using Tentacle Strike.

mapped_achievements.name: Bless You
mapped_achievements.description: Bless a Hex totem 20 times in public matches.

mapped_achievements.name: Bloodbath
mapped_achievements.description: In public matches with The Oni, down 75 Survivors during Blood Fury.

mapped_achievements.name: Bloodied Hands
mapped_achievements.description: In public matches, safely unhook Survivors while being Broken a total of 10 times.

mapped_achievements.name: Bloody Millionaire
mapped_achievements.description: Accumulate a total of 1 million blood points. (blood points can be spent before reaching the total)

mapped_achievements.name: Bodyguard
mapped_achievements.description: In public matches, take a protection hit while the Killer is carrying a Survivor, 30 times.

mapped_achievements.name: Bound and Downed
mapped_achievements.description: Down speared Survivors 30 times with The Deathslinger in public matches.

mapped_achievements.name: Break For It
mapped_achievements.description: In public matches, escape a match while being Broken a total of 5 times.

mapped_achievements.name: Broken Bodies
mapped_achievements.description: In public matches, hook a Survivor while 3 other Survivors are injured, 10 times.

mapped_achievements.name: Bump in the Night
mapped_achievements.description: Down Survivors during Nightfall 50 times in public matches.

mapped_achievements.name: Butcherin'
mapped_achievements.description: In public matches, with The Cannibal, successfully chainsaw a total of 100 times.

mapped_achievements.name: Campbell's Chapel Legacy
mapped_achievements.description: In a public match, repair the generator in the chapel and live to tell the tale.

mapped_achievements.name: Caws of Death
mapped_achievements.description: Down 50 Survivors with Dire Crows in public matches.

mapped_achievements.name: Cherish your Life
mapped_achievements.description: In a public match, repair the generator in The Game's Bathroom and live to tell the story.

mapped_achievements.name: Chorus of Chaos
mapped_achievements.description: In public matches, make 30 unique survivors scream.

mapped_achievements.name: Classy Act
mapped_achievements.description: In a public match, repair the generator in Midwich School's music room or chem lab and escape.

mapped_achievements.name: Cleansed in Agony
mapped_achievements.description: Ensnare 30 Survivors in Cages of Atonement with The Executioner in public matches.

mapped_achievements.name: Close Shave
mapped_achievements.description: Dodge basic attacks or projectiles 100 times in public matches.

mapped_achievements.name: Collision Course
mapped_achievements.description: Slam one Survivor into another 10 times in public matches.

mapped_achievements.name: Complete the Evolution
mapped_achievements.description: In public matches, injure or down 3 Survivors who are Hindered.

mapped_achievements.name: Conniption
mapped_achievements.description: In public matches, with The Spirit, use Yamaoka's Haunting to down 30 Survivors.

mapped_achievements.name: Cottage Owner
mapped_achievements.description: In a public match, repair the generator in the Mother's Dwelling and live to tell the story.

mapped_achievements.name: Cripple them all
mapped_achievements.description: In public matches, with the Trapper, pick up a total of 100 survivors caught in your Bear Traps.

mapped_achievements.name: Cruelty Loves Company
mapped_achievements.description: With The Knight, damage a Survivor while they are actively pursued by a Guard 50 times.

mapped_achievements.name: Cutting Out
mapped_achievements.description: In public matches, while The Killer is carrying you, wiggle out of The Killer's grasp 10 times.

mapped_achievements.name: Deadly Plunge
mapped_achievements.description: In public matches, as a Killer, fall a combined distance of 1000 meters.

mapped_achievements.name: Death of Ignorance
mapped_achievements.description: Down a Survivor suffering from the Oblivious status effect 15 times in public matches.

mapped_achievements.name: Deep Cleansing
mapped_achievements.description: In public matches, cleanse 100 Hex totems.

mapped_achievements.name: Denied!
mapped_achievements.description: In public matches, close the hatch 30 times.

mapped_achievements.name: Deranged Pursuit
mapped_achievements.description: In public matches, as the Legion, down 25 different Survivors that have Deep Wound applied.

mapped_achievements.name: Desperate Escape
mapped_achievements.description: In public matches, perform a fast vault within 3 seconds of getting hit 15 times.

mapped_achievements.name: Devoted Gatekeeping
mapped_achievements.description: In public matches, sacrifice all survivors before the last generator is repaired, 15 times.

mapped_achievements.name: Disarm and Dismember
mapped_achievements.description: In public matches, hit 50 Survivors holding a Special Item.

mapped_achievements.name: Dismantle
mapped_achievements.description: In public matches, break a total of 50 individual Hooks.

mapped_achievements.name: Don’t Open, Dead Inside
mapped_achievements.description: In a public match, complete the generator at the Fallen Refuge and escape.

mapped_achievements.name: Dream Demon
mapped_achievements.description: In public matches, pull 200 Survivors into the Dream World.

mapped_achievements.name: Dungeon Crawler
mapped_achievements.description: In a public match, complete the generator inside the torture room in the Forgotten Ruins and escape.

mapped_achievements.name: End of Days
mapped_achievements.description: Hook 15 Survivors during the End Game Collapse in public matches.

mapped_achievements.name: Engineer
mapped_achievements.description: In public matches, repair a Generator in the Damage state , 50 Times. One time per generator.

mapped_achievements.name: Escape Artist
mapped_achievements.description: In a public match, successfully escape the hook and escape.

mapped_achievements.name: Escaping the Nightmare
mapped_achievements.description: In public matches, open the exit gate 35 times as a Survivor.

mapped_achievements.name: Even Punishment
mapped_achievements.description: In a public match, teleport to your Phantasm traps and hit all 4 individual survivors at least once.

mapped_achievements.name: Ever Vigilant
mapped_achievements.description: In public matches, complete 20 healing actions on Survivors once all generators have been completed.

mapped_achievements.name: Every Last Drop
mapped_achievements.description: Deplete 30 items in public matches.

mapped_achievements.name: Evil Incarnate
mapped_achievements.description: In a public match, kill all 4 survivors with the TIER III Evil Within.

mapped_achievements.name: Expert Generalist
mapped_achievements.description: Escape 8 times while repairing the equivalent of 1 generator with only 2 universal perks equipped.

mapped_achievements.name: Expert Killer
mapped_achievements.description: Reach killer online grade Silver I.

mapped_achievements.name: Expert survivor
mapped_achievements.description: Reach survivor online grade Silver I.

mapped_achievements.name: Extraterrestrial
mapped_achievements.description: In a public match, complete the generator at the base on Toba Landing and escape.

mapped_achievements.name: Fearless Healer
mapped_achievements.description: In public matches, heal a total of 25 Health States while in the Basement.

mapped_achievements.name: Final Days
mapped_achievements.description: In public matches, take 10 protection hits during the Endgame Collapse.

mapped_achievements.name: First to the Punch
mapped_achievements.description: Down 30 Survivors next to raised pallets in public matches.

mapped_achievements.name: Fleet of Foot
mapped_achievements.description: Help other Survivors by increasing their movement speed 50 times.

mapped_achievements.name: Flight to Freedom
mapped_achievements.description: In a public match, repair the generator in the eyrie and escape.

mapped_achievements.name: From the Deep
mapped_achievements.description: Grab a Survivor hiding inside a locker 25 times in public matches.

mapped_achievements.name: From the void she kills
mapped_achievements.description: In a public match, chain 3 or more blinks and land on a survivor, grabbing him successfully.

mapped_achievements.name: Game Over
mapped_achievements.description: In public matches, sacrifice or kill 30 Survivors after the last Generator has been activated.

mapped_achievements.name: Getting the hang of it
mapped_achievements.description: Raise your grade for the first time.

mapped_achievements.name: Ghost in the Machine
mapped_achievements.description: Damage 50 generators while Undetectable in public matches.

mapped_achievements.name: Gifts for the Fog
mapped_achievements.description: In a public match, burn a Visceral offering.

mapped_achievements.name: Grim Pilgrimage
mapped_achievements.description: In a public match, repair the generator in the upper level of the Shrine and escape.

mapped_achievements.name: Hack the Mainframe
mapped_achievements.description: In a public match, repair the generator by the command center on Shelter Woods and escape.

mapped_achievements.name: Hand-Eye Coordination
mapped_achievements.description: Find and use the Hand or Eye of Vecna and escape a Trial.

mapped_achievements.name: Handyman
mapped_achievements.description: In public matches, repair generators for a total of 100 full repairs.

mapped_achievements.name: Happy Holidays
mapped_achievements.description: Open at least 100 mystery boxes on the bloodweb (available during select special events).

mapped_achievements.name: Healthy Obsession
mapped_achievements.description: Heal other Survivors marked as the Obsession for a total of 10 health states in public matches.

mapped_achievements.name: Heavy Burden
mapped_achievements.description: In public matches, hit 25 different individual Survivors while carrying another Survivor.

mapped_achievements.name: Hemophobia
mapped_achievements.description: In a public match, escape the Disturbed Ward without losing a single drop of blood.

mapped_achievements.name: Hero of Wallachia
mapped_achievements.description: In public matches, pallet stun the Killer 10 times while holding a rare, common, or uncommon item.

mapped_achievements.name: Hiding Seeker
mapped_achievements.description: In a public match, end a chase against any Killer by hiding inside a locker 35 times.

mapped_achievements.name: High Speed Pursuit
mapped_achievements.description: As a Killer, vault 50 times while chasing Survivors in public matches.

mapped_achievements.name: Holiday Get-Together
mapped_achievements.description: In a public match, have at least 3 survivors hooked in the basement at the same time.

mapped_achievements.name: Honor the Bloodline
mapped_achievements.description: In public matches, reveal the Killer's aura for a total of 60 seconds in a single trial.

mapped_achievements.name: House of Pain
mapped_achievements.description: In a public match, repair the generator in Myers' house and live to tell the story.

mapped_achievements.name: Humanitarian
mapped_achievements.description: Affect other Survivors with positive status effects 50 times in public matches.

mapped_achievements.name: I
mapped_achievements.description: Reach prestige Level I with any character.

mapped_achievements.name: I See You
mapped_achievements.description: Down 30 Survivors suffering from the Exposed status effect in public matches.

mapped_achievements.name: I Want to Play a Game
mapped_achievements.display_name: I Want to Play a Game
mapped_achievements.description: In public matches, with The Pig, put 125 Reverse Bear Traps on Survivors.

mapped_achievements.name: I've got your back
mapped_achievements.description: In public matches, save a total of 50 survivors from death.

mapped_achievements.name: II
mapped_achievements.description: Reach prestige Level II with any character.

mapped_achievements.name: III
mapped_achievements.description: Reach prestige Level III with any character.

mapped_achievements.name: III-50
mapped_achievements.description: Reach prestige Level III-50 with any character.

mapped_achievements.name: In the void she walks
mapped_achievements.description: In public matches, with the Nurse, blink and successfully land an attack a total of 500 times.

mapped_achievements.name: Insult and Injury
mapped_achievements.description: Escape a chase 50 times after stunning the Killer with a pallet in public matches.

mapped_achievements.name: It wakes
mapped_achievements.description: Raise a character level to 10.

mapped_achievements.name: Item of Obsession
mapped_achievements.description: In a public match, as the killer's obsession, escape as the last survivor without getting hit.

mapped_achievements.name: Joke’s On You
mapped_achievements.description: In public matches, hit a Survivor within 3 seconds of performing a Scamper 10 times.

mapped_achievements.name: Jump Scared
mapped_achievements.description: Playing as The Animatronic, interrupt a Survivor in the Security Office 15 times in public matches.

mapped_achievements.name: Jump Scares
mapped_achievements.description: In public matches, with the Wraith, Surprise & hit a total of 100 survivors.

mapped_achievements.name: Kitted Out
mapped_achievements.description: In 35 different public matches, pick up and use at least one Special Item as a Survivor.

mapped_achievements.name: Leapfrog
mapped_achievements.description: In public matches, jump over a pallet or through a window during a chase, 200 times.

mapped_achievements.name: Left For Dead
mapped_achievements.description: As the last person still alive, activate the last generator and escape through the exit gate.

mapped_achievements.name: Legendary Killer
mapped_achievements.description: Reach Killer Iridescent I.

mapped_achievements.name: Legendary survivor
mapped_achievements.description: Reach survivor online grade Iridescent I.

mapped_achievements.name: Lifting The Fog
mapped_achievements.description: Reveal the Killer's aura 50 times in public matches.

mapped_achievements.name: Looter
mapped_achievements.description: In public matches, unlock 100 chests.

mapped_achievements.name: Lost All Hope
mapped_achievements.description: Down a Survivor within the bounds of any Exit Gate.

mapped_achievements.name: MU/TH/UR Dearest
mapped_achievements.description: In a public match, complete the generator at the mess hall in the Nostromo Wreckage and escape.

mapped_achievements.name: Mad House
mapped_achievements.description: In a public match, bring the 4 survivors to insanity Tier 3 at least once in the same match.

mapped_achievements.name: Made it out alive!
mapped_achievements.description: In public matches, escape the match alive for a total of 100 times.

mapped_achievements.name: Make Some Noise
mapped_achievements.description: In public matches, scream 50 times.

mapped_achievements.name: Master Killer
mapped_achievements.description: Reach killer online grade Gold I.

mapped_achievements.name: Master survivor
mapped_achievements.description: Reach survivor online grade Gold I.

mapped_achievements.name: Medic
mapped_achievements.description: In public matches, heal others for a total of 100 health states.

mapped_achievements.name: Milk 'n' Cookies
mapped_achievements.description: In a public match, take the item from the chest in the basement in at least 30 different trials.

mapped_achievements.name: Movie Buff
mapped_achievements.description: In a public match, complete the generator inside the movie theater in Greenville Square and escape.

mapped_achievements.name: Multi-tasker
mapped_achievements.description: Down 30 Survivors while carrying another Survivor in public matches.

mapped_achievements.name: Near-Death Experience
mapped_achievements.description: In public matches, get downed only once and escape the match alive, 25 times.

mapped_achievements.name: Neither Seen Nor Heard
mapped_achievements.description: Apply the Oblivious status effect to Survivors 30 times in public matches.

mapped_achievements.name: Nerves of steel
mapped_achievements.description: In public matches, get a total of 500 successful Skill-Checks.

mapped_achievements.name: No one left behind
mapped_achievements.description: In a public match, rescue someone after at least one gate has opened.

mapped_achievements.name: None the Wiser
mapped_achievements.description: In public matches, hit 5 Survivors that are Oblivious.

mapped_achievements.name: Not Today
mapped_achievements.description: In public matches, unhook yourself 50 times.

mapped_achievements.name: Not half bad
mapped_achievements.description: Raise a character level to 25.

mapped_achievements.name: Old West Oasis
mapped_achievements.description: In a public match, repair the generator in the Saloon and escape.

mapped_achievements.name: One More Step
mapped_achievements.description: In public matches, take a hit while you have the Endurance status effect 10 times.

mapped_achievements.name: One Thousand Cuts
mapped_achievements.description: Deal maximum Laceration on Survivors 50 times in public matches.

mapped_achievements.name: Operation: Survival
mapped_achievements.description: In a public match, repair the generator in the Treatment Theatre’s operation theatre and escape.

mapped_achievements.name: Outbreak Breakout
mapped_achievements.description: Open the exit gates and escape from Raccoon City Police Department 20 times in public matches.

mapped_achievements.name: Outrage
mapped_achievements.description: In public matches, during a chase, damage a Survivor who drops a Pallet within a chase, 100 times.

mapped_achievements.name: Outrun Evil
mapped_achievements.description: In a public match, crawl your way out through the hatch.

mapped_achievements.name: Outrun the Overlap
mapped_achievements.description: In a public match, repair the generator in the main house in the Garden of Joy and escape.

mapped_achievements.name: Outta Nowhere
mapped_achievements.description: In public matches, hit 40 Survivors with a basic attack while you are Undetectable.

mapped_achievements.name: Party Crasher
mapped_achievements.description: In public matches, damage a generator while at least 1 Survivor is Hooked, 100 times.

mapped_achievements.name: Perfect Escape
mapped_achievements.description: In a public match, as a survivor, complete with at least 5000 blood points in each score category.

mapped_achievements.name: Perfect Killing
mapped_achievements.description: In a public match, as a killer, complete with at least 5000 blood points in each score category.

mapped_achievements.name: Power Moves
mapped_achievements.description: Equip 0 perks, repair generators for a total of 1 full repair and escape 8 times in public matches.

mapped_achievements.name: Preemptive Strike
mapped_achievements.description: Hook a Survivor in a public match before any generators have been fully repaired.

mapped_achievements.name: Prey Upon
mapped_achievements.description: Playing as The Unknown, put Survivors in the Dying State using UVX 20 times.

mapped_achievements.name: Prowler
mapped_achievements.description: Detect 100 Survivors with Killer Instinct in public matches.

mapped_achievements.name: Quick Draw
mapped_achievements.description: Interrupt a Survivor cleansing a Totem 10 times in public matches.

mapped_achievements.name: Raccoon City Recruit
mapped_achievements.description: In a public match, repair the generator on the 1st floor of the RPD station’s main hall and escape.

mapped_achievements.name: Rebuilding The Borgo
mapped_achievements.description: In a public match, repair the generator in the main house in the Shattered Square and escape.

mapped_achievements.name: Remember Who I Am
mapped_achievements.description: Playing as The Ghoul in public matches, perform 30 perfectly timed grab-attacks.

mapped_achievements.name: Rescue Mission
mapped_achievements.description: Stun the Killer with a pallet while they are carrying a Survivor 5 times.

mapped_achievements.name: Resourceful
mapped_achievements.description: In public matches, swap held Survivor items for new ones from chests 10 times (max once per chest).

mapped_achievements.name: Resurgence
mapped_achievements.description: Heal other Survivors for 10 health states while at least 3 Survivors are injured, dying or hooked.

mapped_achievements.name: Rightful Owner
mapped_achievements.description: As The Lich, collect the Hand or Eye of Vecna and kill or sacrifice all Survivors in the same match.

mapped_achievements.name: Risk it all
mapped_achievements.description: In a public match, as a survivor, use a visceral item or add-on without using a protective ward.

mapped_achievements.name: Second Act
mapped_achievements.description: In public matches, recover from dying by yourself or with help 10 times.

mapped_achievements.name: Selfless Survival
mapped_achievements.description: Heal a Survivor from the dying state to the injured state 30 times in public matches.

mapped_achievements.name: Serial Killer
mapped_achievements.description: In public matches, Sacrifice the Obsession 30 times.

mapped_achievements.name: Shine On
mapped_achievements.description: In public matches, blind the Killer with a flashlight 30 times.

mapped_achievements.name: Shock Therapy
mapped_achievements.description: In a public match, repair the generator on the second floor of the Disturbed Ward and escape.

mapped_achievements.name: Shocking Treatment
mapped_achievements.description: In public matches, hit survivors 500 times with The Doctor's Shock Therapy attack.

mapped_achievements.name: Shrine Apparatus
mapped_achievements.description: In a public match, repair the generator in the Temple basement and live to tell the tale.

mapped_achievements.name: Silent Approach
mapped_achievements.description: In public matches, interrupt and grab 25 Survivors while they are repairing generators.

mapped_achievements.name: Skilled Generalist
mapped_achievements.description: Escape 8 times while repairing the equivalent of 1 generator with only 3 universal perks equipped.

mapped_achievements.name: Skilled Huntress
mapped_achievements.description: In public matches, down survivors 20 times with The Huntress' Hatchets further than 24 meters.

mapped_achievements.name: Skillful
mapped_achievements.description: Boost any perk to level 3.

mapped_achievements.name: Slip Into the Stream
mapped_achievements.description: In public matches, with The Singularity, hit 30 Survivors that you recently teleported to.

mapped_achievements.name: Smoked
mapped_achievements.description: In public matches, down 100 Survivors while they are intoxicated by The Afterpiece Tonic.

mapped_achievements.name: Sorted
mapped_achievements.description: In a public match, spend most of the trial injured (more than 50%) and live to tell the story.

mapped_achievements.name: Speed Kills
mapped_achievements.description: Hit 30 survivors with a Lethal Rush in public matches.

mapped_achievements.name: Survival Treasures
mapped_achievements.description: In a public match, escape while bringing a new item to the campfire.

mapped_achievements.name: Swirling Death
mapped_achievements.description: In public matches, throw 1000 Hatchets.

mapped_achievements.name: Symphony of Fire
mapped_achievements.description: Playing as The Dark Lord, hit 20 Survivors using Hellfire in public matches.

mapped_achievements.name: Tag Team
mapped_achievements.description: With The Twins, down 10 Survivors while Victor is clinging to them in a public match.

mapped_achievements.name: Taking One For The Team
mapped_achievements.description: Protect a recently unhooked Survivor by taking a hit near them 250 times.

mapped_achievements.name: Taste the Darkness
mapped_achievements.description: In public matches, interrupt 10 Survivors while they are performing a vault.

mapped_achievements.name: Terminal Illness
mapped_achievements.description: In public matches, with The Plague, down 50 Survivors affected by the maximum infection.

mapped_achievements.name: Terror of LV-426
mapped_achievements.description: In public matches, hit 30 Survivors using a Tail attack.

mapped_achievements.name: Texas BBQ
mapped_achievements.description: In public matches, hook 25 Survivors in the Basement. Once per Survivor per match.

mapped_achievements.name: The Grand Sacrifice
mapped_achievements.description: In a public match, get 4 sacrifices in a single match.

mapped_achievements.name: The Grind
mapped_achievements.description: In public matches, with the Hillbilly, chainsaw a total of 100 survivors.

mapped_achievements.name: The man behind the bush
mapped_achievements.description: In public matches, with The Shape, stalk for a total of 300 power tier increase.

mapped_achievements.name: Thrill of the Chase
mapped_achievements.description: In public matches, down 10 Claw Trapped survivors .

mapped_achievements.name: Tools of the Trade
mapped_achievements.description: Achieve a merciless victory 5 times in a public match with only 3 universal perks equipped.

mapped_achievements.name: Totally Vulnerable
mapped_achievements.description: In public matches, with Ghost Face, down 50 Marked Survivors.

mapped_achievements.name: Triage
mapped_achievements.description: When a Survivor is injured far away, heal them 30 times without travelling more than 16 meters.

mapped_achievements.name: Triggered
mapped_achievements.description: In public matches, with The Hag, cause survivors to trigger her Phantasm traps 300 times.

mapped_achievements.name: Under Pressure
mapped_achievements.description: In public matches, perform 20 great skill checks while injured.

mapped_achievements.name: Unforgettable Getaway
mapped_achievements.description: In a public match, repair the generator in the Chalet and live to tell the tale.

mapped_achievements.name: Viral Video
mapped_achievements.description: Apply Condemned on Survivors 30 times in public matches.

mapped_achievements.name: Vulture
mapped_achievements.description: In a public match, escape with an item that another player brought into the match.

mapped_achievements.name: What Lurks Beneath
mapped_achievements.description: In public matches, injure Survivors while in the Basement 25 times.

mapped_achievements.name: Whiffing to Success
mapped_achievements.description: In public matches, cause the killer to miss an attack before taking a vault, 50 times.

mapped_achievements.name: With Scars to Show
mapped_achievements.description: Go from healthy to injured during a chase and escape. Do this 50 times in public matches.

mapped_achievements.name: Wounded Healer
mapped_achievements.description: In public matches, heal other Survivors for a total of 50 health states while you are also injured.

mapped_achievements.name: Zealous
mapped_achievements.description: In a public match, get more than 8K blood points in one scoring category.
